plot outline: Four friends set forth to an abandoned mansion in Sakleshpur, where one of the protagonist's dead aunt lived. In the house is an antique piece worth crores. They want to find that and sort their lives out. But, this plan sees a big ghostly obstacle.
title: Thamisra
plot: Four friends set forth to an abandoned mansion in Sakleshpur, where one of the protagonist's dead aunt lived. In the house is an antique piece worth crores. They want to find that and sort their lives out. But, this plan sees a big ghostly obstacle.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
